facts: Jesse Weiland is a gang leader and a contract killer
Jesse wass arrested in a raid while his pregnant wife Lynn goes into labor
Jesse could be potentially linked to dozens of high profile unresolved murders in the area
Buzz McKinnon is a thug and a killer for hire
Jesse learned that Buzz and Long-Hair have killed his family
The scene takes place in the bedroom of a boat house
There are two chairs is the bedroom, standing back to back. Buzz and Long-Hair are tied to those chairs. Hands and feet tied. Blood spigoting.
Jesse circles the men tied to the chairs with the shotgun.
comm_style: Jesse wants to learn who killed his family
Jesse is calm and in control of the situation
Buzz is scared for his life, but remains defiant and talks back, pretending to be tough
Long-Hair remains silent in this scene
goals: After Jesse pours gasoline over Buzz, Buzz breaks and starts begging for his life
